title: Transformative learning project for building sustainable higher education institutions

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of higher education systems and the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)
context.additional_context: PBL execution in small groups of 3-4 learners, followed by final product presentation and evaluation.

learning_goals: Learners can propose three higher education institutional strategies incorporating sustainability through transformative learning theory
Learners can diagnose institutional sustainability growth stages by analyzing single/double/triple learning cycles
Learners can design sustainable management process improvements using the I3E model (Inform-Engage-Empower-Embed)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
